name: Winter (The Marlboro Man)
description:
A plataformer for the #familiargamejam5, where a game must be made within 48 hours. Very simple in appearance and execution, deals with the theme of deconstruction.

The theme is conveyed twofold: first, game mechanics and their justifications are removed as levels are completed . Second, the game's appearance does change slightly with each dissapeared mechanic. Read [http://gamejolt.com/games/winter/104141/news/thoughts-on-winter/105340] for extended babbling :).

All coding is done in C++ with SDL2 using the mighty gedit. Graphics have been done in-house using the gimp - the only exception being the background picture (a gimp filter of a www.morguefile.com image). Music comes from musopen.org. Sounds were copied and pasted from old projects (I think they came from flashkit.com).

Source available at https://github.com/TheMarlboroMan/winter-fgj5
